description:
Gelmud is a former high class demon that served Demon Lord http://anidb.net/ch99349 [Clayman] of the Ten Demon Lords. He wanted to make http://anidb.net/ch99594 [Orc Lord] the new Demon Lord and manipulate him but instead was devoured by it.
Source: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken Wiki
name: Gelmud
